amendment.description: To authorize appropriations for Foreign Relations and for Foreign Assistance, and to authorize Millennium Challenge Assistance.

action.text: Amendment SA 1974 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to suspend Rule XVI on amendment SA 1974 not agreed to by Yea-Nay. 40 - 57. Record Vote Number: 413.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1974.

Amendment SA 1974 proposed by Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S13352-13357) To authorize appropriations for Foreign Relations and for Foreign Assistance, and to authorize Millennium Challenge Assistance.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to suspend Rule XVI on amendment SA 1974 not agreed to by Yea-Nay. 40 - 57. Record Vote Number: 413.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1974 proposed by Senator Lugar.
